00038 //............................................................................
00039 void QActive::defer(QEQueue *eq, QEvent const *e) {
00040     eq->postFIFO(e);
00041 }
00042 //............................................................................
00043 QEvent const *QActive::recall(QEQueue *eq) {
00044     QEvent const *e = eq->get();    // try to get an event from deferred queue
00045     if (e != (QEvent *)0) {                                // event available?
00046 
00047         postLIFO(e);      // post it to the front of the Active Object's queue
00048 
00049         QF_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00050         QF_INT_LOCK_();
00051 
00052         if (e->dynamic_ != (uint8_t)0) {             // is it a dynamic event?
00053 
00054             // after posting to the AO's queue the event must be referenced
00055             // at least twice: once in the deferred event queue (eq->get()
00056             // did NOT decrement the reference counter) and once in the
00057             // AO's event queue.
00058             Q_ASSERT((e->dynamic_ & 0x3F) > 1);
00059 
00060             // we need to decrement the reference counter once, to account
00061             // for removing the event from the deferred event queue.
00062             //
00063             //lint -e1773                           Attempt to cast away const
00064             --((QEvent *)e)->dynamic_;      // decrement the reference counter
00065                    // NOTE: cast the 'const' away, which is legitimate because
00066                    // it's a dynamic event
00067         }
00068 
00069         QF_INT_UNLOCK_();
00070 
00071     }
00072     return e;  // pass the recalled event to the caller (NULL if not recalled)
00073 }
